Thaumaturgy 6

Celestial Music

EA Kailasa,  MA Bandar Log

Combat

effect number [effect_number]: 10
damage [damage]: 262144
spec [spec]: 4227088
range [rng_bat]: 1
casting time [casttime]: 150%
area of effect [aoe_s]: 100% of battlefield

Bless/Buff: Quickness
 
(Affects Magic Beings Only [magiconly], Affects Sacreds Only [sacredonly], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune])
The caster begins playing the music of the Celestial Spheres. All celestial dancers (Apsaras, Gandharvas and Yakshas) become enthralled by the divine music and perform a celestial battle dance that gives them quickness.
